CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 4, 1947, pg. 4, reads: "Holiday Sparkle is in the Air - Pretty women took the center of the stage in Pittsburgh during the holiday season, and here Courier Cameraman Teenie Harris went here and there to snap some of the best-lookers for you... Center photo: Another trio of loveliness shows Mrs. Robert Jones (center), who was hostess during the holidays to Ethel Stewart (left) of Cleveland, and Ida Avery (right) of Chicago. They were snapped at Loendi Club during the holiday season..."
TitMainTitle: Ethel Stewart, Mrs. Robert Jones, and Ida Avery wearing fur coats and standing in front of Christmas tree in Loendi Club
